website_summaries.verdict: Versatile everyday boot with traditional detail yet modern comfort features.
pros: Soft leather upper hugs the foot and naturally flexes with movement
Memory foam cushion foot bed and comfort gel heel pod for superior shock absorption
Breathable padded mesh lining, which aids in moisture management
cons: Some wearers feel the toe box is too narrow and tapered, in which case it's recommended to order a wide pair

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great👍👍
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I'm an amputee, and I am always looking for lightweight shoes that are durable. These are without question, the best shoes I've owned yet. They feel like together they don't weigh a pound, and they have the inner gel pads, that even though I only have one real foot, it makes my foot completely comfortable. I walk about 6 miles per day for my job and these shoes make my walking effortless. I will absolutely buy another pair when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Alpa Chino

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have to say these are feather light and very comfortable. I thought they would take a few wearings to break them in but the second wearing was all that was necessary. I would recommend these nice looking boots to anyone. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot
customer_reviews.text: I’m concerned about the quality of the leather in the uppers; time will tell but for now it accounts for the four stars and not five. Fit, comfort and looks are all good but the leather will not remind one of a moc style boot from LL BEAN or similar. I hope to be pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Bird

customer_reviews.title: he loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13 year old son and he has only taken them off to go to bed. Needless to say, he loves them! I love them because they were a fair price for a great shoe. I hate to spend too much when he's growing out of shoes every 6 months. :p
customer_reviews.author: gakette

customer_reviews.title: These are incredibly light.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Nunn/Bush shoes for a while now and they are the most comfortable shoe I've ever owned. Only problem is they are getting more difficult to find in the "big box stores".
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great; however, returned 1st pair for EEE rather than EE.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very light and will work fine as casual and motorcycle boots. Plus I only paid $15 for them. You can hardly buy a pair of nice socks for thay
customer_reviews.author: david t eib

customer_reviews.title: great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are super comfy, the air soles keep me light on my feet al day. I really cant complain about the price as well. excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Opsy80

customer_reviews.title: Not real leather!
customer_reviews.text: This price of this shoe should be $20-30. Not real leather. Feels cheap to wear, have them away!
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Best work shoe for versatility
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and light weight. I would def but these again. Might always have to have a pair. Very durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic Delarosa

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have fit. 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed In the quality of the shoe. Haven’t worn them yet. I have a narrow foot and have difficulty finding shoes that fit. They are too wide unfortunately. Length is good.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Buffalow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and cute! Bought as a gift for my dad and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've owned in my 55 years
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these shoes! They are literally like wearing slippers they are so comfortable. I recommend these shoes from this company wholeheartedly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Still loving these shoes after several months of hard wear. So, I bought a second pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great look and fit. Perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jack Myers

customer_reviews.title: Size matters - nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, EE width to be exact. Shoe companies often say that their "wide" size will fit. I am often disappointed to find that the "W" in the description is more of a DD than an EE. So I tend to order thhe next size up. This time I ordered according to the size chart. Nunn-Bush is true to the size chart. These boots fit great! I would be able to wear heavier socks in cold weather and still be comfortable. the construction of the boot is good quality. I anticipate it will wear well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dxpope

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable like a walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn these shoes yet. I have tried them on and worn them in the house. They seem to be exactly what I wanted and feel like they will be very comfortable. I am 90 and have gotten used to comfortable, casual shoes. I was looking for something comfortable and yet would look good when I am dressed for church, etc. I believe these shoes will fill the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: Seriously God bless this company. My son is a type one diabetic and finding comfortable handsome shoes for him is as likely as winning the lottery. Well I won the lottery when I found these. They fit like comfortable sneakers but have the appearance of dress shoes. Please never stop making these
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Most reliable economical shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoes is comfortable and lightweight. I’ve been wearing it for 2 weeks now and I love it. First that comfort gel on your heel felt little weird but once you get used to it, it’s just another blessing to have. I just ordered another 9.5 wide for future pair. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lowmeter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent qualilty
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and comfortable. arrives fast. warm in cold weather as exected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to order shoes online because not all sizes are correct, BUT these fit perfectly, I wear a 10.5 medium and that's what the shoes actually were. The boots look well made and are lightweight. With half-way decent care they should last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Badger 305

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight Chukka Boots
customer_reviews.text: Before I opened the package I wondered what was in it as it seemed much too light for the boots I had ordered. They are amazingly light and comfortable. I LOVE THEM. Thank you Nunn Bush.
customer_reviews.author: andrejules

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these boots, he even had me buy a second pair in a different color!! He has very wide feet and its hard to find something that fits him well. He says that these are comfortable all day and they seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnFYI

customer_reviews.title: Did I removed my slippers?
customer_reviews.text: Well,after a few days of wearing them, they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: John Simonet

customer_reviews.title: Light as a Feather!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely lightweight and comfortable. The sizing was spot on for me.
customer_reviews.author: SpringerBill

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot so far. Very light and fits as it should. I just ordered another. I don’t think you can beat it for the price. I question how long the sole will last as it skuffs up pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: david t eib

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful: comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and light that I immediately bought two more pairs. Admittedly my size was at a great, low price at that time, but had they been more I might well have ordered perhaps one more pair at least. It is actually hard to imagine a better shoe: they feel like the ankle boots they are, but are pretty much as comfortable as a good slipper. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daily walking on rough ground. So far they're doing really well. .Light and comfortable with good support. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: New shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn this type of shoe but I love these. They help me stand better and they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: moospatrol

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely lightweight and comfortable shoes! I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size, runs one size too big. Other than that, product looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these and had me order a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: These boots appear to run 1 full size larger that a normal 12
customer_reviews.author: honeybunny

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable right out of the box.  No break in period required.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable. Heel tab makes it very easy to pull boot on. I bought a second pair so I can continue to enjoy this comfortable shoe when the first pair wears out. Also bought a pair as a gift for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for at a great sale price.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: A very lightweight shoe . Fits great and very comfortable but definitely not a winter boot
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a winter boot but it's very comfortable and the most lightweight shoe of this size I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Returning boots
customer_reviews.text: Boots did not fit in the heel. I returned them 12/04/2019 and have not received notice yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Lighter Than my Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really light boots. To me that’s good, less weight to pull around. They fit well. The boots have got a lot of nice features. Has comfort gel for the heel and memory foam as the insert. Both work to give you the best comfortable feeling feet possible. Has a big enough loop that my finger can actually fit in to pull my foot into the boot. Nice!! They have a little design on each side of the boot, three squares. The stitching was straight and consistent throughout the boots. Four Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Vogtmann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable From Day One
customer_reviews.text: My husband is wearing these. These shoes are lightweight and the size 10 fits him well. The first time he wore these boots, he said they were very comfortable as if he had worn them many times prior. The casual look goes with anything from blue jeans to khaki pants. He says they are also very comfortable around the ankle as they do not chafe any part of the ankle which is an experience my husband had with similar shoes. There is a pull loop on the top rear of the shoe that is designed so it does not catch on the pant leg and cause pants to ride up over the boot.
customer_reviews.author: AquaJock

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Nunn Bush has quickly become one of brands where I always know I'm going to get a high quality, comfortable shoe that is going to last a long time. The fit is true to size and my son says they are nice and roomy on his feet. I ordered these for him because he lives in a city and walks everywhere, and sometimes will randomly decide he wants to go hiking right after work. These boots are great for walking around the city and hiking in the hills above his home. They have nice traction and the sole has cushion so his feet don't ache or get tired no matter how active he is.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the black
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what's up, but it is hard for me to believe these could be real leather. The black looks and smells like cheap cheap pleather. The fact that they are so lightweight makes me question even more that they are in fact leather. Nothing about them says durable or sturdy. They are pretty comfy, and but everybody thinks they looks terrible, me included. The also smell insanely plasticy. Lastly they fit me perfect in size 11, which is a little odd since I'm a 10.5 Maybe in another color and without the plastic smell they would have rated closer to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great-looking comfortable chukka boot for men
customer_reviews.text: Great-looking chukka boot for men! The size 10 was true to size and the tumbled leather is nice and sturdy but not too fancy. I am particularly pleased with the inside which feels great ! There is a gel heel pad and the footbed is topped with memory foam-all adding to the comfort of walking in these boots! That is worth five stars any day! I wish all shoes and boots came with gel heel and memory foam. The outer sole is lightweight eva and this was a nice surprise. These boots are comfortable and lightweight and perfect for walking in fall weather.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Durable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice looking boots with a fairly aggressive tread. They seem very well made and durable. The leather outsole feels durable but comfortable and they should last a long time with regular use. They actually feel relatively light for a boot which is probably due to the synthetic outsole. At the time of this review the retail price was around $75 which is reasonable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Fits well; moderately comfortable, but needs more padding
customer_reviews.text: These boot are very light, fit me quite well and look good. I wore them for a couple days and found them moderately comfortable but they could be better. After a few days of wear, my overly sensitive feet were a bit achy -- more padding and better shock absorption would have helped a lot. Not bad overall but just a little more padding would have made a huge difference in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Guy

customer_reviews.title: comfort that lasts all day long
customer_reviews.text: Sneaker shoe boots. This is a hybrid for the foot. I can wear them comfortably all day long as a professor. I can hike in them. I can walk in the snow with ease. I didn't realize how much this sneaker shoe boot complements my collection. The sole is extra cushioned and you can feel it with every step.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B. Kashdan

customer_reviews.title: Boot
customer_reviews.text: This fit as expected for male who wears size 11 shoes and even has wide feet. They look different than the picture. The leather has a cracked look to it that's not really appealing to me. The memory foam felt didn't feel as soft, but it's usually more apparent when worn for a while or used for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: LaTasha Neal

customer_reviews.title: lightweight boots with an urban hiker style
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, casual comfort. Because these are essentially a man version of ankle boots, they'd look spiffy with jeans or office casual khakis. I'm not sure how well they'll hold up in a Pacific Northwest winter, but I'm certain they'd keep feet dryer than the sneakers my son sloshed around in last year.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I was genuinely surprised by how comfortable and light weight these hiking shoes are. It fits great and is very comfortable. Great for hiking or just walking in the park. Not much arch support. For people who need arch support, these boots are not for you. Otherwise, these boots are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably Casual
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nice, comfortable, and inexpensive. The only thing I don't like is the black looks dull and faded. They do fit well and are very light on the feet. These are a basic boot for casual wear and they are actually very supportive. It is almost like walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe/outdoor slipper
customer_reviews.text: These weigh nothing! They are lightweight and practical, very good for jobs that require you to stand or be on your feet a lot. The leather doesn't really smell like leather, but it says it's 100% leather on the box. The shoes are very comfortable and offer a lot of support.
customer_reviews.author: Cross-eyed cat

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A little gel in the sole and the entire shoe is lined with a sponge material that makes the shoe nice and soft. Great leather work, it looks and it is flexible. It is an informal look, but the leather finish is very well done and they shoes can be wear with more formal pants.
customer_reviews.author: teeinep

customer_reviews.title: very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well constructed of light weight but tough and strong materials. Better than heavy clunky boots of years ago! The insole has an added gel pack on the heel for extra comfort on days when you are on your feet the whole day. Great new concept in boots!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, love the style
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well made with high-quality materials and workmanship. I'm really impressed with the comfort and style of these casual boots. They look great with jeans or khakis and they're comfortable all day. The insole is really comfortable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Very good boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit true to size. The instep is high and does not pinch. The gel sole makes walking comfortable. The quality is very good. It fits medium width foot but can stretch a bit with wear. Very good-looking pair of boots for everyday wear. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gerbera_Reads

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking casual boot.
customer_reviews.text: A very lightweight, comfortable fitting leather upper casual boot with synthetic soles. These boots are great for walks in mild weather but I'm not sure how well the smoother soles will do in snowy or icy conditions as there isn't even a hint of tread.
customer_reviews.author: mateo52

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: A really nice pair of mid boots. Very comfortable. Can walk in them and be comfortable for hours. Basic style, which actually allows for a good bit of versatility. Can be worn to the office or casually with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Tracybeth

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, are comfortable and should serve well for the coming cold weather and snow. I was surprised, however, by the extremely rubbery feel. Nevertheless, these will look good with a pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: bronx book nerd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: What a great looking boot! These are lightweight and comfortable. The memory foam insole is perfect, and the gel heel pad only adds another layer of comfort. My hubby loves them!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Faz

customer_reviews.title: comfortable with an added gel pad in the heel
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable boot with a gel pad in the heel for added comfort. They're stylish as well. The stitching appears to be durable but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hicks

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: i typically wear a 10.5M, and the 10 i got felt like in between 10.5-11. very lightweight and supportive. if you like the style i would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

customer_reviews.title: Fit, material and comfort top quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality! These are a beautiful mens boot. Fit, material and comfort top quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jaye L

product_meta.title: Nunn Bush Men's Cam Moccasin Toe Chukka Boot
product_meta.description: The Nunn Bush cam moccasin toe boot is a classic, casual chukka boot that never goes out of style, The Nunn Bush cam moc toe boot features soft and supple leathers and a wedge eva sole. Lightweight, yet long on comfort, you’ll love the memory foam footbed and comfort gel heel pad more with every step you take.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately ankle-high from arch
Classic STYLE: made with premium materials to assure you the comfort level you expect in a well styled everyday casual ankle boot that will mold and move with the natural shape of your foot

Comfort: Soft tumbled leather uppers with memory foam/EVA molded footbed with comfort gel heel insert. Padded tongue and collar With breathable mesh fabric linings provide additional comfort and cushioning

Perfect FIT: pamper your feet with this amazing casual chukka boot that is constructed with premium materials to provide the highest level of fit integrity. Available in Medium width, wide width and extra Wide Widths for the perfect fit
Outsole: Lightweight EVA plus the durability of rubber combines for a robust and comfort Sole
Value: Nunn Bush is highly regarded as a premier footwear brand by providing the best value and style in fine Men's footwear since 1912
